name: 運動能量代謝專題研究
goals: 了解及強化運動能量代謝的相關知識
探討當前有關運動能量代謝的研究主題及現況
發展有關運動能量代謝的相關研究課題
syllabus:
Week 1 (9/8) **Introduction**

Week 2 (9/15) **Exogenous carbohydrate and regulation of muscle carbohydrate utilisation during exercise** **& Measurement of Energy Metabolism**

Week 3 (9/22) **Metabolism of Macronutrients during Exercise**

Week 4 (9/29) **Adipose and muscle tissue response to exercise and/or physical activity in a fasted and fed status.**

Week 5 (10/6) **Influence of gender & age on metabolism**

Week 6 (10/13) **Energy metabolism in people with obesity & diabetes**

Week 7 (10/20) **Metabolic adaptations to exercise training**

Week 8 (10/27) **Lab testing** 

Week 9 (11/3) **Lab testing**

Week 10 (11/10)  **Exercise and appetite** 

Week 11 (11/17) **Exercise and bone** 

Week 12 (11/24) **Presentation**

Week 13 (12/1) **Presentation**

Week 14 (12/8) **Presentation**

Week 15 (12/15) **Presentation**

Week 16 (12/22) **Final exam**
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
